source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic time-lapse video from the bow of a container ship sailing on the open ocean. Dramatic clouds streak across a vast blue sky above the calm sea. The ship is seen steadily moving forward on its journey.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenic time-lapse video from the bow of a container ship sailing on the open ocean. Dramatic clouds streak across a vast blue sky above the calm sea. The ship is seen steadily moving forward on its journey.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several dolphins leap alongside the ship as it moves forward, which is not reflected in the current description.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a scenic time-lapse video from the bow of a container ship sailing on the open ocean. Dramatic clouds streak across a vast blue sky above the calm sea, while several dolphins leap alongside the ship as it steadily moves forward on its journey.
